SEARCH
Package user

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
user.UserManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserManager
public class UserManager extends Object implements IUserManager
Manages user authentication, loading from CSV, and password updates.

Supports Applicants, HDB Officers, and HDB Managers. Reads user data on initialization and provides login/logout functionality.

    • createUserFromFile

      private User createUserFromFile(String file, String[] values)
      Creates a User instance based on the CSV file path and parsed values.
      Parameters:
      file - the CSV file path
      values - the CSV columns: name, NRIC, age, status, password
      Returns:
      a new User subclass instance, or null if file unrecognized

      Parameters:
      user - the User whose password was changed
